name: facilities
title: Prepare Facilities
description: A component that prepares facilities data for Location Allocation.

inputs.name: candidates_table
inputs.title: Candidate Facilities
inputs.description: The source table containing candidate facility data, which could be opened or activated based on the allocation strategy.
inputs.helper: The source table containing candidate facility data, which could be opened or activated based on the allocation strategy.

inputs.name: required_table
inputs.title: Required Facilities (optional)
inputs.description: The source table containing required facility data, which are always activated regardless of the allocation strategy.
inputs.helper: The source table containing required facility data, which are always activated regardless of the allocation strategy.

inputs.name: competitors_table
inputs.title: Competitor Facilities (optional)
inputs.description: The source table containing competitors data, which are used to influence demand allocation in the optimization process.
inputs.helper: The source table containing competitors data, which are used to influence demand allocation in the optimization process.

inputs.name: candidates_id
inputs.title: Candidate facilities ID column
inputs.description: The column containing the candidate facility unique IDs.
inputs.helper: The column containing the candidate facility unique IDs.

inputs.name: candidates_geom
inputs.title: Candidate facilities geometry column
inputs.description: The column containing the candidate facility point locations.
inputs.helper: The column containing the candidate facility point locations.

inputs.name: required_bool
inputs.title: Include required facilities
inputs.description: Whether to consider mandatory or pre-selected facilities
inputs.helper: Whether to consider mandatory or pre-selected facilities

inputs.name: required_id
inputs.title: Required facilities ID column
inputs.description: The column containing the required facility unique IDs.
inputs.helper: The column containing the required facility unique IDs.

inputs.name: required_geom
inputs.title: Required facilities geometry column
inputs.description: The column containing the required facility point locations.
inputs.helper: The column containing the required facility point locations.

inputs.name: competitors_bool
inputs.title: Include competitor facilities
inputs.description: Whether to consider competitors.
inputs.helper: Whether to consider competitors.

inputs.name: competitors_id
inputs.title: Competitor facilities ID column
inputs.description: The column containing the competitor facility unique IDs.
inputs.helper: The column containing the competitor facility unique IDs.

inputs.name: competitors_geom
inputs.title: Competitor facilities geometry column
inputs.description: The column containing the competitor facility point locations.
inputs.helper: The column containing the competitor facility point locations.

inputs.name: group_bool
inputs.title: Assign groups to facilities
inputs.description: Whether to assign a group to each facility (i.e. region, brand)
inputs.helper: Whether to assign a group to each facility (i.e. region, brand)

inputs.name: candidates_group
inputs.title: Candidate facilities group ID column
inputs.description: The column containing the ID representing the group each candidate facility belongs to.
inputs.helper: The column containing the ID representing the group each candidate facility belongs to.

inputs.name: required_group
inputs.title: Required facilities group ID column
inputs.description: The column containing the ID representing the group each required facility belongs to.
inputs.helper: The column containing the ID representing the group each required facility belongs to.

inputs.name: min_capacity_bool
inputs.title: Assign minimum capacity to facilities
inputs.description: Whether to include the minimum capacity of a facility.
inputs.helper: Whether to include the minimum capacity of a facility.

inputs.name: candidates_min_capacity
inputs.title: Candidate facilities minimum capacity column
inputs.description: The column containing the minimum capacity of each candidate facility.
inputs.helper: The column containing the minimum capacity of each candidate facility.

inputs.name: required_min_capacity
inputs.title: Required facilities minimum capacity column
inputs.description: The column containing the minimum capacity of each required facility.
inputs.helper: The column containing the minimum capacity of each required facility.

inputs.name: max_capacity_bool
inputs.title: Assign maximum capacity to facilities
inputs.description: Whether to include the maximum capacity of a facility.
inputs.helper: Whether to include the maximum capacity of a facility.

inputs.name: candidates_max_capacity
inputs.title: Candidate facilities maximum capacity column
inputs.description: The column containing the maximum capacity of each candidate facility.
inputs.helper: The column containing the maximum capacity of each candidate facility.

inputs.name: required_max_capacity
inputs.title: Required facilities maximum capacity column
inputs.description: The column containing the maximum capacity of each required facility.
inputs.helper: The column containing the maximum capacity of each required facility.

inputs.name: costofopen_bool
inputs.title: Include cost of opening facilities
inputs.description: Whether to include the fixed costs of opening a specific facility.
inputs.helper: Whether to include the fixed costs of opening a specific facility.

inputs.name: candidates_costofopen
inputs.title: Candidate facilities cost of open column
inputs.description: The column containing the cost of opening each candidate facility.
inputs.helper: The column containing the cost of opening each candidate facility.

inputs.name: required_costofopen
inputs.title: Required facilities cost of open column
inputs.description: The column containing the cost of opening each required facility.
inputs.helper: The column containing the cost of opening each required facility.

outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The table with the prepared facilities data.
outputs.helper: The table with the prepared facilities data.
